name: JingleBailOut
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jingle bailout
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ah, the holidays. It’s a time for family. A time for friends. But it can also be a time for some awkward, contentious moments between family and friends.
 
That’s why we created the “Jingle Bail Out,” a custom Amazon Alexa skill that utilizes powerful AI (and some pretty awful dad jokes) to quickly defuse the situation, and get everyone back into the holiday spirit.
 
It’s yet another example of how Team One and technology can help make the holidays just a little bit brighter.
 
Happy Technolidays™.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
